vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
χαλκο-λίβᾰνος [ῐ], ου, ἡ,
either fine brass, brass of Lebanon, or yellow frankincense, [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
burnished bronze, fine bronze
orichalcum, fine bronze, a factitious metal of which there were several varieties, the white being of the highest repute, or, deep-tinted frankincense, Rev. 1:15; 2:18*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: latón (o cobre) derretido en un horno y luego pulido
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đồng đánh bóng ; đồng sáng đã luyện trong lò lửa ; đồng trong lò lửa
